meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a button.
meanings.sent1: The small, round candies were so buttony in shape.
meanings.sent2: Her coat had a buttony appearance with its rows of shiny fasteners.
meanings.sent3: The buttony flowers in the garden seemed to be smiling at the sun.
meanings.sent4: The buttony clouds in the sky looked like fluffy cotton balls.
meanings.sent5: The buttony mushrooms in the forest were easy to spot among the leaves.

meanings.sent1: The buttony shirt was easy to fasten in the morning rush.
meanings.sent2: She wore a buttony vest over her blouse for added warmth.
meanings.sent3: The buttony teddy bear had a cute little bow on its chest.
meanings.sent4: His buttony jacket made him look quite dapper at the party.
meanings.sent5: The buttony gloves kept her hands cozy in the chilly weather.

meanings.sent1: The buttony dress shimmered with golden fasteners all over.
meanings.sent2: The buttony sofa looked elegant with its intricate design.
meanings.sent3: The buttony backpack jingled softly as she walked down the hall.
